attributes.action: disclose the existence of extraterrestrial beings visiting Earth and interacting with Earths governments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the last few years there has been so much evidence coming forward about extraterrestrials visiting Earth. All Earth governments know this but refuse to disclose the information for various reasons. The people's of this country are more than capable of handling this informantion and when it is disclosed will lead the way in moving forward with this information. Britain is a great nation a world leader in many areas let this be one!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
